parameters: <ActiveMessage:\C[1]■EV発生■>
\N<Segi>Irime-san...

\N<Irime>...That look on your face, you've received word about your
next opponent as well, haven't you?
\N<Segi>...Yes.

\N<Irime>It's tough... I never imagined my next opponent would be
you...
\N<Segi>...

\N<Irime>Ahaha... Don't worry about it too much. I knew something
like this would come when we got involved in this ridiculous
battle.

\N<Irime>Hey, I've been prepared for this for a long time. What about
you?
\N<Segi>I am...

\N<Irime>...I asked something mean, didn't I? But when I said I was
prepared, I meant it.

\N<Irime>Now that it's come to this, let's both give it our all in
the fight. No hard feelings, okay?
\N<Segi>...

A

\N<Irime>Now that it's come to this, let's both give it our all in

<ActiveMessage:\C[1]■EV発生■>
\N<Segi>Irime-san...

\N<Irime>There are many things I want to say and talk about... but
for now... could you please leave...?
B

\N<Irime>There are many things I want to say and talk about... but
for now... could you please leave...?

\N<Irime>Segi... How about you? Can you still control your ego and
endure?

\N<Irime>I... might be at my limit. I have no idea how long I should
withstand this seemingly endless self-questioning...
\N<Segi>Miss Irime...
weather : 0 : 5 : 5 : 15 : 1 : Light_01D : 1
weather : 1 : 5 : 5 : 5 : 1 : Light_01C : 1
<ActiveMessage:\C[1]■EV発生■>
\N<Rame>Ah... hello, Segi-san.

\N<Segi>Hey, Rame-chan. If... it's just if, okay? If you have any
worries, I want to help. Riia was also concerned about you.
\N<Rame>Is that so... Riia-chan is worried about me...

\N<Rame>...But it's okay. There's nothing wrong. Besides... I can't
tell anyone about that kind of thing...
\N<Segi>Eh...?
\N<Rame>It's okay... I'm really okay, so don't worry.
A
\N<Rame>It's okay... I'm really okay.

\N<Rame>It might be strange to say this, but I'm rooting for both of
you.

\N<Rame>Also... um... it's that. Tomorrow is Riia-chan's birthday,
isn't it...?

\N<Rame>So, I've prepared a gift. I couldn't afford anything
expensive with my allowance, though.

\N<Rame>I'm sure Riia-chan won't be thrilled with a present from
me... but it's the thought that counts...
\N<Irime's Husband>Hey... Segi-san. Lately, I've been thinking a lot.

\N<Irime's Husband>No matter how little freedom I have, I wonder if it's really
okay to continue like this. Is it alright to leave
everything to my wife? Isn't there something I can do...?

\N<Segi>...I understand how you feel, but please don't rush and take
your time to rest. Surely that will be the best way to show
consideration for your wife.
\N<Irime's Husband>...
<ActiveMessage:\C[1]■EV発生■>

\N<Irime's Husband>Miss Segi... I've heard about it from my partner. The next
opponent is... you, Miss Segi.
\N<Segi>...Yes.

\N<Irime's Husband>Please don't make such a face. I want you to fight with all
your heart, without holding back because of any sense of
debt or guilt towards me or Rame.

\N<Irime's Husband>After all, it's my sin that I couldn't bear the burden of
this battle...

\N<Irime's Husband>I am... prepared to accept any outcome. I believe I'm ready
in my heart.

\N<Irime's Husband>Besides... I'm somewhat relieved that you are my opponent.
It's nothing but a convenient and dull hope, though...
\N<Segi>...
\N<Segi>About your illness... I heard it from Mrs. Hojiko.

\N<Segi>You were injured protecting Irime... and that led to your
illness...

\N<Irime's Husband>...Ah. That might have happened, yes. But that's in the
past. It's not something that should bind her now.

\N<Irime's Husband>However, perhaps it's because of that sense of debt that she
devotes herself to someone like me...

\N<Irime's Husband>I want... to set her free. I want to release her from the
guilt...
\N<Segi>...
A

\N<Irime's Husband>I am... ready to accept any outcome. I believe I've prepared
my heart for this.

\N<Irime's Husband>Besides... I'm somewhat relieved that you're the one
involved. It's nothing but a convenient, dull-witted hopeful
speculation, though...
\N<Segi>...I have to go pick up Riia.
\N<Segi>...I have to go pick up Riia.
\N<Segi>...
